title: Qutebrowser: A keyboard-driven, vim-like browser based on PyQt5
author: happy-go-lucky
content: readme.asciidoc qutebrowser keyboard-driven, vim- browser based pyqt5 qt.website | blog | releasesqutebrowser is keyboard-focused browser a minimal gui. s based python pyqt5 free software, licensed under gpl. was inspired other browsers/addons dwb vimperator/pentadactyl.screenshotsdownloads the github releasespage available downloads (currently source archive, standalonepackages well msi installers windows). install detailed instructions how getqutebrowser running various platforms.documentation addition the topics mentioned this readme, following documents areavailable: key binding cheatsheet:quick start guide free training course remember those key bindings.frequently asked questionscontributing qutebrowserinstallchange logreporting segfaults to write userscriptsgetting help can help the irc channel#qutebrowser freenode(webchat), by writing message themailinglist qutebrowser@lists.qutebrowser.org.s a announce- mailinglist qutebrowser-announce@lists.qutebrowser.org ( announcements get sent the general qutebrowser@ list).contributions / bugs want contribute qutebrowser? awesome! please read contribution guidelines details useful hints. you found bug have feature request, can report in severalways: the built- :report command the automatic crash dialog.open issue the github issue tracker.write mail themailinglist qutebrowser@lists.qutebrowser.org. security bugs, please contact directly mail@qutebrowser.org, gpg id0xfd55a072.requirements following software libraries are required run qutebrowser:python 3.4 newer (3.5 recommended)qt 5.2.0 newer (5.9.0 recommended)qtwebkit (old reloaded/ng) qtwebenginepyqt 5.2.0 newer(5.8.1 recommended) python 3pkg_resources/setuptoolspypeg2jinja2pygmentspyyaml following libraries are optional provide better user experience:cssutils generate documentation the :help command, using gitrepository (rather a release), asciidoc is needed. windows, colorama is needed display colored log output. install directions how install qutebrowser its dependencies.donatingworking qutebrowser is very rewarding hobby, like (nearly) hobbies also costs money. namely have pay the server domain, do occasional hardware upgrades
